name: Crazy Crane
description:
Based on the classic Spectrum game "Crazy Crane" (obvs) by A. Dunn and published by Voyager Software.

Programmed by Stephen Smith (stephen.carlylesmith@googlemail.com).  Twitter: @stephencsmith

If you have any suggestions for different game modes or mechanics, please let me know at the email address above.

AIM

* You must grab hold of the cargo and place it on the dockside to the left of the crane stantion.  Collect 5 cargo to get to the next level.

* To complete a level you must collect enough cargo; don't let too many fall into the water otherwise you're FIRED!

CONTROLS

* Arrow keys to move the crane.

* Space to unhook the current cargo.
